ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.70' (eDOS_GU_Profile) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.67' (eDOS_Common_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.68' (eDOS_GU_Component) in any order.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion: No detailed assertion information is available

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.75' (eDOS_GU_Response_Profile) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.72' (eDOS_Acknowledgement_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.73' (eDOS_GU_Acknowledgement_Component) in any order.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion: No detailed assertion information is available

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.71' (eDOS_NG_Profile) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.67' (eDOS_Common_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.69' (eDOS_NG_Component) in any order.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion: No detailed assertion information is available

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.76' (eDOS_NG_Response_Profile) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.72' (eDOS_Acknowledgement_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.74' (eDOS_NG_Acknowledgement_Component) in any order.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion: No detailed assertion information is available

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.
If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M10' then MFI-1.1 (Identifier) SHALL be valued 'OMC'.
If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M08' then MFI-1.1 (Identifier) SHALL be valued 'OMA'.
If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M04' then MFI-1.1 (Identifier) SHALL be valued 'CDM'.
MFI-6 (Response Level Code) SHALL be valued 'NE'.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If MFI-6 Response Level Code is any value other than 'NE'.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MFE-5 (Primary Key Value Type) SHALL be valued 'CWE'.
OM1-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' within the message.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion: No detailed assertion information is available

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: OM1-2 (Producer's Service/Test/Observation ID) SHALL match MFE-4 (Primary Key Value - MFE).

Field.Name: Other Service/Test/Observation IDs for the Observation

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-7.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-7.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-7.1 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-7.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-7.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-7.4 is a valid LOINC code.

Field.Name: Preferred Report Name for the Observation
Preferred Short Name or Mnemonic for Observation

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OM1-9 (Preferred Report Name for the Observation) and OM1-11 (Preferred Long name for the observation are not valued.

Field.Name: Preferred Long Name for the Observation

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OM1-9 (Preferred Report Name for the Observation) and OM1-10 (Preferred Short Name or Mnemonic for Observation) are not valued.

Field.Name: Identity of Instrument Used to Perform this Study

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M10' then OM1-18 (Nature of Service/Test/Observation) SHALL be valued 'F', 'S', or 'P'.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion : OM1-18='F' or OM1-18='S' or OM1-18='P'

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M08' then OM1-18 (Nature of Service/Test/Observation) SHALL be valued 'A' or 'C'.

Field.Name: Date/Time Stamp for any change in Definition for the Observation
Outside Site(s) Where Observation may be Performed
Observations Required to Interpret the Observation

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-31.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-31.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-31.1 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-31.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-31.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-31.4 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-34.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-34.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-34.1 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-34.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-34.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-34.4 is a valid LOINC code.

Field.Name: Factors that may Affect the Observation

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-52.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-52.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-52.1 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-52.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-52.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-52.4 is a valid LOINC code.

Field.Name: Observation Identifier associated with Producer's Service/Test/Observation ID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-56.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-56.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-56.1 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM1-56.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) value is "LN", OM1-56.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM1-56.4 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: OM2-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment.

Field.Name: Reference (Normal) Range - Ordinal and Continuous Observations
Critical Range for Ordinal and Continuous Observations
Absolute Range for Ordinal and Continuous Observations

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: OM3-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment.

The first part of OM4-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment. The second part of OM4-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL be valued sequentially.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion : The first part of OM4-1 SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment.
Failed Assertion : The second part of OM4-1 SHALL be valued sequentially.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: When present, either OM4-6.3 (Specimen.Name of Coding System) or OM4-6.6 (Specimen.Name of Alternate Coding System) SHALL be valued 'SCT' or 'HL70487'.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion : OM4-6.3='SCT' or OM4-6.3='HL70487' or OM4-6.6='SCT' or OM4-6.6='HL70487'

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: OM5-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment.

Field.Name: Test/Observations Included within an Ordered Test Battery

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM5-2.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", OM5-2.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM5-2.1 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OM5-2.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) value is "LN", OM5-2.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Assertion.Description: Failed assertion : OM5-2.4 is a valid LOINC code.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: CDM-1 (Primary Key Value - CDM) SHALL match MFE-4 (Primary Key Value - MFE)
